thread.section_title: Brittany Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small but quaint
thread.title_full: Small but quaint - Review of Brittany Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Scott W
title: Small but quaint
text:
Room was very small...but very eloquently decorated....lift is so so small so might take a couple of trips to room if you have alot of luggage (but love the tartan wallpaper in lift) Its very close to the train station and bus which is the best if your looking for public transport to get around..only a 1 minute walk...plenty of lovely eateries and cafes around..but hey Paris is about the E Tower and shopping...this is a good base to work from...nice balcony window to get some fresh air...we found it a little difficult to understand the reception staff..but they are courteous.
Room Tip: street view See more room tips
